au.com.codeka.carrot.tmpl

Class TagNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.codeka.carrot.tmpl.Node
      • au.com.codeka.carrot.tmpl.TagNode

  • public class TagNode
extends Node
    A TagNode represents a node of the form "{% tagname foo %}" where "tagname" is the name of the tag and "foo" is the parameters.

    Tags are represented by the Tag class, which is extensible.
